resources.string: Discover a vast, haunted kingdom in Hollow Knight: Silksong! Explore, fight and survive as you ascend to the peak of a land ruled by silk and song.
Indie hit continues the mythic saga with Melnak, the daughter of Hades

Supergiant Games has unveiled the latest technical test update for Hades II, bringing significant improvements to the highly anticipated sequel. The early access roguelike continues to build on its predecessor\'s foundation while introducing fresh mechanics and narrative elements that expand the mythological universe.
